text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Trump came thru w/this 4 @GOP states AFTER the deaths of 30,000 voters fr:#COVID19.They didn’t get respirators as,early on,Trump said #COVID19 was a deep state democrat hoax,when he knew better.His voters trusted him & literally gasped to death.There’s a moral in there somewhere.
